title: Macron: Putin told him Russia won't escalate Ukraine crisis - Associated Press
content:
1. Macron: Putin told him Russia won't escalate Ukraine crisis  Associated Press
  2. Analysis: Putin's use of crude language reveals a lot about his worldview  CNN
  3. First Thing: talks between Macron and Putin fail to produce breakthrough  The Guardian
  4. EU leaders attempt to dodge Putin's divide and rule tactics  BBC News
  5. Russia pours cold water on Ukraine crisis de-escalation, as Macron meets with Zelensky  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) â€” French President Emmanuel Macron said Tuesday that Russian President Vladimir Putin told him that Moscow would not further escalate the Ukraine crisis. Macron also said it would take time to find a diplomatic solution to the rising tensions, which represent the biggest security crisis between Russia and the West since the Cold War.
